name: Big Youth
description:
Since 2004, Big Youth has developed a threefold culture: digital consulting, creative innovation, and user experience. Since then, Big Youth has developed on this basis. Hence, a strong international orientation and a perfect understanding of the need to address the right content all over the world.
Big Youth is a team of enthusiasts, with a shared mindset, sharing the same vision and desire: to lead brands to success in the digital world.
